Sentencas: Yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) is an important engineering ceramic oxide used for various applications, including solid electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells due to its high ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Interatomic potentials for cubic zirconia and yttria-stabilized zirconia optimized by genetic algorithm

Sentencas: Accurate and computationally inexpensive interatomic potentials for cubic ZrO2 and YSZ are required to accommodate the large number of defect configurations originating from high concentrations of Y and oxygen vacancies and to statistically understand their properties in realistic time.
Titulo: Interatomic potentials for cubic zirconia and yttria-stabilized zirconia optimized by genetic algorithm

Sentencas: In this study, a genetic algorithm has been used to optimize empirical interatomic potential parameters for cubic ZrO2 and 10Y2O3 mol% YSZ using energies, forces acting on atoms, and stresses generated by ab initio calculations as training data.
Titulo: Interatomic potentials for cubic zirconia and yttria-stabilized zirconia optimized by genetic algorithm

Sentencas: The optimized potentials reproduce the structural, mechanical, and thermal properties as well as the ionic conduction properties more accurately than previously reported empirical interatomic potentials.
Titulo: Interatomic potentials for cubic zirconia and yttria-stabilized zirconia optimized by genetic algorithm

Sentencas: The developed potentials will be useful for a statistical characterization of YSZ properties, combined with more accurate ab initio calculations.
Titulo: Interatomic potentials for cubic zirconia and yttria-stabilized zirconia optimized by genetic algorithm
